verbose_text: Various mechanisms have been proposed for the role of H. pylori in chronic ITP : the production of Ag specific Abs that are cross-reactive with platelet surface glycoproteins (GP IIb / IIIa or GP Ib) due to molecular mimicry increased plasmacytoid dendritic cell numbers and variable host immune response to virulence factors such as vacuolating associated cytotoxin gene A (VacA) and CagA [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Abs that are cross-reactive with platelet surface glycoproteins (GP IIb/IIIa or GP Ib) due to molecular mimicry increased plasmacytoid dendritic cell numbers and variable host immune response
